name: Walker (itch) (KFkas)
description:
PT-BR : Colete gravetos para acender sua fogueira e se proteger do frio à noite.

EN : Collect kindling to light your campfire and protect yourself from the cold at night.

Teclado / Keyboard :

W / A / S / D - Andar / Walk MB Left / Clique Esquerdo - Atacar / Attack Space / Espaço - Dash

Controle / Gamepad :

Left Stick / Analógico Esquerdo - Andar / Walk X(Xbox) - Atacar / Attack A(Xbox) - Dash

Thumbnail Artist : https://www.instagram.com/slovencactus/
